message: Let's split the money 60/40.  A fair deal to start.
I think a 60/40 split is more fair, with me getting the larger share since I'm the one proposing this time.  Let's get this done!
Bob, let's be reasonable. I'm offering you 45. That's more than I took in my initial offer. This back and forth is only hurting us both.
Let's just split it evenly.  We're both losing money with each round, and this is getting ridiculous!
